item.title: Building Websites With Hugo
item.description: So one thing led to the other (From looking up how to install Zsh terminal on Termux) and here I am surfing the internet on how to build a website with Hugo and I must say it has been a nerve-racking 3 days.ðŸ˜‚ The process is quite simple and I am absolutely not going to bore you on what Hugo is, the innernet has enough articles to do that. What I’m interested in is getting you to build a website from start to finish in this post.

item.title: About
item.description: Hello and Welcome to Coders Nest. My name’s Abdul-Hameed and I am not what you think I am.
